strapiPost.title: Noon2Moon Mountain Bike Race This Saturday
strapiPost.content:
Coler Mountain Bike Preserve is hosting its first-ever endurance mountain bike race called Noon2Moon, this Saturday, May 14th!

  • The Event: Spectators can enjoy 15+ vendors at The Homestead, kids can participate in activities in the Kids Zone, Airship will be open late, there will be food trucks, beer, a heckle zone, and music. Get in on the fun with the peer-to-peer fundraiser and back a rider. When you register, back a rider, or donate, youâ€™re supporting the trails and programs that make Coler a unique destination for all.
  • The Race: Race solo, or grab friends and make it a team. Day-of registration for the 6- and 12-hour rides will be available on-site at The Homestead, ending at 11a. 

Coler Mountain Bike Preserve is a community space provided by Peel Compton Foundation, learn more about this event HERE.
